column4: Woodhill Dr between Larkwood Dr and Hedgewood Ct
column5: At least one lane is blocked.  Fire Dept on scene due to reports of smoke from a building.

column4: The NWS has issued a Winter Weather Advisory in effect until December 16 at 10:00 a.m.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
